module.caption: WINC3400 Connecting a EAP-TLS / PEAPv0 with TLS / PEAPv1 with TLS Secured AP Example
module.info: This example demonstrates how to connect WINC3400 Wi-Fi module to a 802.1x enterprise secured network which uses TLS as phase2 authentication. The supported enterprise methods by this example are EAP with TLS (Extensible Authentication Protocol - Transport Layer Security) PEAPv0 with TLS (Protected Extensible Authentication Protocol v0 - Transport Layer Security) PEAPv1 with TLS (Protected Extensible Authentication Protocol v1 - Transport Layer Security)
